Eseneths, commonly known as soul-stitchers, are dispassionate surgeons who repair damaged souls. **[Recall Knowledge - Monitor](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 41 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 [Eseneth](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2422) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 83 **Perception** +29; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) 120 feet **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +33, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +33, [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +29, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +31, [Sewing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +35, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +33 **Str** +8 **Dex** +8 **Con** +5 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +2 --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +32 **Will** +27 **HP** 290 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) **Resistances** [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) 15, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 15 **Sudden Stitch** **Trigger** A creature within the eseneth's reach successfully Strikes the eseneth; **Effect** The eseneth attempts to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) the triggering creature. --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** spirit needle +33, **Damage** 3d10+14 piercing plus spirit touch and [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Ranged** spirit needle +33 ([thrown 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)), **Damage** 3d10+14 piercing plus spirit touch **Divine Innate Spells** DC 38, attack +30 - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only) - **4th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will) - **8th** [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (×3) - **Constant (4th)** [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Mend Soul** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The eseneth restores 25 HP to itself or an [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creature it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). **Seize Soul** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) The eseneth tries to yank the soul out of the body of a creature they've [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33). The eseneth attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the target's Fortitude DC.
**Critical Success** The eseneth grabs the target's soul. The body is released and is [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28) for 2 rounds. When the body ceases being paralyzed, its soul returns instantly and the target wakes. The soul—grabbed by the eseneth—is [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222), is [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), has a fly Speed equal to the creature's Speed, and otherwise has all the same statistics. It can't attack, cast spells, or attempt any skill checks that require a physical body other than checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79), and it must always maintain line of effect to its body.
**Success** As critical success, but the paralysis ends after 1 round.
**Failure** The target remains grabbed or restrained, but its soul remains in its body.
**Critical Failure** The grab ends. **Shred Soul** **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The eseneth deals 3d10+14 force damage to an [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creature they've [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). **Spirit Grasp** An eseneth can [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures despite being corporeal. The eseneth uses their [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to Grapple incorporeal creatures as normal but can't use Athletics for other actions against incorporeal creatures, like [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40). **Spirit Touch** A eseneth's Strikes affect [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures with the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune and deal 2d6 negative damage to living creatures and 2d6 positive damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160).
Soul Needles An eseneth's spirit needles are composed of the psychopomp's essence. The needles form and dissipate at the eseneth's will and exist only as long as the eseneth does.
